original_text: And ships shall come from the coast of Chittim, and shall afflict Asshur, and shall afflict Eber, and he also shall perish for ever.
korean_text: 깃딤 해변에서 배들이 와서 앗수르를 학대하며 에벨을 괴롭힐 것이나 그도 멸망하리로다 하고

sentences.original_text: And ships shall come from the coast of Chittim
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 배들이 깃딤 해안에서 올 것이라

sentences.original_text: and he also shall perish for ever
